title: Ep. 106: The Year in TV With ‘Mr. Robot’ Creator Sam Esmail
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald sit down with the creator of 'Mr. Robot' to discuss, debate, and rank the best television shows of the year. Hear where shows like 'Atlanta' (2:30), 'The Night Of' (12:20)'Game of Thrones' (21:00) and 'Black Mirror' (37:22) rank or if they make the cut at all.
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
